participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and upbeat, Alex enjoys connecting with others and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway. I live in the city of Grand Rapids, Michigan. My favorite player is Mike Trout. I collect memories of my accomplishments. I like to look my best even when I'm at work.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Jordan embraces change and enjoys living life to the fullest.
participant_2.background: I like to listen to upbeat music to get pumped up before I race my go kart. I am an only child and I am excited to start a new chapter in my life at college. I like to dye my hair pink because it's a fun and playful color that matches my personality. I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day been going?
Pretty good! I'm just hanging out at home before I start my new job at a university next week.
That sounds exciting! What will you be doing there?
I'll be working in the admissions office.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do a great job.
Oh cool! I'm from there too.
Yeah, it is. What's your favorite thing about Grand Rapids?
I love the food scene. There are so many great restaurants to choose from.
Me too! I love going out to eat in Grand Rapids.
I love The Mitten Brewing Company. Their food is delicious and their beer is even better.
I've never been there! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's my favorite restaurant in Grand Rapids.
